analysis.summary: The test results show a complete failure in the login functionality, with all 5 test cases failing. The average test duration is 1167ms, which is relatively high. The test coverage appears to be limited, focusing only on the login functionality without testing other critical areas of the application.
coverageGaps: Account overview page access without login
trends: Consistent failures across all login-related test cases
Missing or invalid locators for key UI elements
recommendations: Improve test coverage to include more critical user flows
Investigate and fix the root causes of the login failures
Optimize test execution time and stability
criticalIssues: Inability to log in with valid or invalid credentials
Inability to access the account overview page without logging in
